original_title: SLSEA, SIA and Huawei step up to drive Sri Lanka’s Green Energy agenda
original_body_lines: In an effort to drive sustainable energy initiatives in Sri Lanka, Huawei recently organized a key conference titled ‘Unleashing the Potential of a Sustainable Energy Future’ in collaboration with the Sri Lanka Sustainable Energy Authority (SLSEA) and the Solar Industries Association (SIA).

The event served as a dynamic platform for industry experts to share profound insights, fostering discourse on critical topics to drive the sector’s evolution, with over 300 prominent renewable energy invitees.
